chat.title: review
chat.message: our new Northern Health ordersets were heavily based / influenced by these ones so are already very similar.

chat.title: review
chat.message: Antibiotic choices vary depending on the reference material and evidence that you use. For example, some places recommend clinda/gent, others cefoxitine, others ancef/flagyl. We suggest not using ancef, as we use it for prophlyactic antibiotics in surgery and hypothetically could lead to resistance... consider separating antibiotics used for phrophylaxis and for treatment.. Should get pharmacy and infectious disease to weigh in and consider local antibiograms.

chat.title: change title
chat.message: Pls change to "intrapartum management of presumed chorioamnionitis"
